queryName: Image policy webhook admission control plugin not set
descriptionText: When running `kube-apiserver`, the `--enable-admission-plugins` flag should include `ImagePolicyWebhook`, and the plugin must be configured in the admission control configuration file so it is operational. If the `--enable-admission-plugins` flag does not contain `ImagePolicyWebhook`, this rule reports a missing attribute for the `kube-apiserver` container.
